derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: probably a shortening of obsolete martinet, from French, probably from the name of St Martin of Tours, celebrated at Martinmas

encyclopedia.content: Martin 简介 Martin，男，2010《快乐男声》南昌唱区5强选手。现为2010快乐男声全国六十强。 参加《快乐男声》比赛 2010《快乐男声》公布了南昌唱区5强名单。印度快男马修斯、残疾选手黄励才、江映蓉学长崔岩巍、“宅男”组合、草原快男特古斯、64岁的老伯韦耀珊都顺利晋级。长得酷似陈冠希的李运钧则是最后一个被宣布晋级的选手。 50名晋级选手的名单就在5位活动嘉宾手中，他们每人宣布10名选手的产生。第一个念名单的是评委莫笑

entry.def: A martin is a small bird with a forked tail.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various swallows with squarish or slightly forked tail and long pointed wings; migrate around Martinmas

Sentence.sentence: They resonated(共鸣) with optimism and ambition in much the same way as the most famous dream speech of all, delivered by Martin Luther King Jr.
Both Martin Luther King and John Kennedy appealed to the idea that humans can transcend what were once considered inherent limitations

Precisely because they were working with old-fashioned machines, George Martin and his team of engineers were forced to apply every ounce of their creativity to solve the problems posed to them by Lennon and McCartney.
